item.description:
Comedy Night at Gas Lamp Grille
Thursday April 22, 2010
7:30 PM

Gas Lamp Grille is scheduling a comedy night one Thursday night each month.
The fee has been $5.00pp. They usually start about 8PM upstairs.
Drinks, Dinner, or Appetizers before is always fun! They have great food.

The last comedians I previewed were funny, it was a great time - they were comedians that have been at The Comedy Connection in East Providence.
This week the headliner is: Greg Howell.

Hope to see you there : ).

Please keep your RSVP accurate so that I can schedule seating for our group appropriately.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be upstairs at bar or at a table reserved for us.
item.name: Comedy Night, Drinks and/or Food at Gas Lamp Grille
